name: Yama's Dream
description:
Once upon a time, vampires lived in the world, 

but there was one good vampire. 

his name is Yama

He is piece Vampire, who never wanted to kill everyone. 

Can you do not broke his true pacifist route? 

you must to help Yama.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Shoot: Mouse
